pageContext.claim: “But he's sitting there -- Sondland. Yes. He's sitting there with Clinton lawyers. They're passing him notes all the time.”
pageContext.analysis: Robert D. Luskin, who represents Sondland, may be a liberal Democrat, but that has not stopped him from representing high profile Republicans. Most famously, he found email evidence and pushed his then-client Republican strategist Karl Rove to amend his testimony to a federal grand jury investigating who revealed Valerie Plame’s identity.
